unnormalised: The solar rooftop subsidy program is a welcome initiative. However, streamlining the application process at the state DISCOM level, particularly in states like Tamil Nadu, is crucial. Many applicants in Chennai have reported delays of over 6 months. A more transparent system, perhaps modelled after the PM-KUSUM scheme, would encourage greater adoption. These subsidies are especially relevant during peak demand, such as during Onam celebrations, when electricity consumption spikes. A well-implemented program can truly illuminate homes across Bharat. More public awareness campaigns are also needed in rural areas.
